Detailed Description

A SortProvider is the base class for all sort of Sorting providers which are able to sort rows of a child provider . NOTE: No writing is possible on a SortProvider. Use GetChildRow to get the row of the child provider and update the child provider directly. See also: Provider, DataItem.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

SortProvider::SortProvider (   ) 
 

If the default constructor is used, the parameters have to be provided by using the method Init.

SortProvider::SortProvider (  Provider *  provider,
INT  columnid = 0,
BOOLEAN  order = TRUE
) 
 

On construction the following parameters have to be specified: provider: The provider which should be sorted. columnid: Specify which columnid has to be sorted. order: Specify whether ascending (TRUE) or descending (FALSE).

void SortProvider::OnExecutingListener (  Provider *  provider = 0  )  [virtual]
 

Called by DelegationProviderListener to modify the progress value. The current version reflects the progress value of the child-provider until 99 percent.
